Reviews.Content: write reviews am pretty easy please decent bed am okay guess shower hot water son found bugs bed middle night bathroom roach ran wall beds comfortable roll smells remodeled outside touched offered aaa discount rude card charged reserved tell expect 2 star shouldnt looking little cheaper hotel offers shuttle universal pay extra couple dollars couldnt wait leave suppose fun bottom universal park parking lot park universal shuttle top recommendation stay hotel terrible service terrible bugs climbing night

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant Hollywood location...”
Reviews.Author: LDN_2009
Reviews.Content: hollywood studio inn brilliantly located positioned sunset blvd directly below busiest stretch hollywood blvd fifteen minute walk centre surrounded shops restaurants cinemas hotels bustling safe basic theres plenty parking rates simple

Reviews.Title: “Well located and incredibly good value, but some rough edges”
Reviews.Author: Bedbugged
Reviews.Content: stayed april 1015 2010 arrived late night thanks flight delays front desk staff helpful facilities basic clean landline phone free wifi youre coming overseas bringing laptop communicate via email skype etc prepared amazingly low cost hardly complain walls thin hear normal activity didnt sleeping sleep car parking plentiful secure strip malls buy stuff eat drink 23 blocks google map bit deceptive distance touristy bits hollywood little bit looks 17 minutes foot egyptian theatre corner hollywood las palmas im reasonably fast walker travelling foot english cities youre visiting tourist hollywood dont mind bit exercise leave car motel explore foot prepared fair bit walking unless youre slow walker hollywood vine subway station motel 25 minutes lot la available rent car impressed day stay couple hours 1100 checkout deadline flight late afternoon told 11 pay night impression wasnt exactly influx guests waiting move pure inflexibility location price minor complaint
